summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganNaturium's Niacinamide Cleansing Gelee 3% is formulated with 3% niacinamide and works to gently dissolve makeup, oil, and impurities, while improving the appearance of skin, for a healthier-looking complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently dissolves impuritiesLeaves skin feeling soft & smoothHelps balance skin, leaving it feeling comfortable, not dry or strippedDermatologist testedFragrance freeVegan, paraben & cruelty freeKey IngredientsNiacinamide: high purity form of vitamin B3, helps balance oil, leaves skin feeling ultra soft & smoothSodium Hyaluronate: replenishes essential moisture, creates a smoothing, plumping-effectSodium Ascorbyl Phosphate: a water soluble & stable form of vitamin C, potent antioxidant that protects skin from environmental stressorsResearch ResultsCLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS*100% of subjects showed immediate & all-day oil control*In an 1-day clinical study on subjects (women & men), representation across all skin types & self-perceived sensitive skin.Item 2627643How To UseApply a few pumps onto dry or damp skin and massage to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly. For a quick mask, leave on for five minutes before rinsing. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.IngredientsAqua, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Decyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Apply a few pumps onto dry or damp skin and massage to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly. For a quick mask, leave on for five minutes before rinsing. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Its not the best honestly
reviews.comments: I've been trying a lot of different face washes lately and this was not it. So much comes out when you squeeze and honestly I don't like the way it feels on my face. I'm not even sure it's really cleaning my face honestly.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments:
Nice cleanser but packaging needs adjustment. Product comes out too quickly and is wasted because you don't need very much to be effective. 
Gentle, not irritating to eyes or Sun.

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: I bought this because I was in a hurry and needed facial cleanser.  I feel I made a good choice.  The cleanser leaves my face feeling clean and not tight.  It creates a good lather with a bit of water added and rinses off easily.

reviews.headline: Fragrance Free
reviews.comments: I didn't realize this was fragrance free so I don't really like it. This is OK I guess if you have acne prone skin. I have sensitive skin but I do like things with a fragrance.

reviews.headline: Jelly cleanser
reviews.comments: I really liked this jelly cleanser.  I felt smooth  and my skin felt clean after.

reviews.headline: Year-round oily skin hero!
reviews.comments: This cleanser does a great job at balancing my skin, whether it is hot or cold weather. I can trust this cleanser to keep my skin's oil under control during the warmer months and also trust it to not over-dry in the winter months.

reviews.headline: Simple Cleanser
reviews.comments: I had never heard of this brand before and got really excited to see it come to Ulta. I've used it for 2 weeks and so far my face hasn't broke out which is great! My dark spots have faded a bit (:

reviews.headline: Nice cleanser
reviews.comments: I think you'd like this if you have normal, combination or sensitive skin. It doesn't smell and has a nice texture. It's a bit too drying for my skin in the desert, even in the summer.
